   19: %%
   20: -module(edlin_expand_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([normal/1, type_completion/1, quoted_fun/1, quoted_module/1, quoted_both/1, erl_1152/1, get_coverage/1,
   25:          check_trailing/1, unicode/1, filename_completion/1, binding_completion/1, record_completion/1,
   26:          no_completion/1, map_completion/1, function_parameter_completion/1, fun_completion/1]).
   27: -record(a_record,
   28:         {a_field   :: atom1 | atom2 | btom | 'my atom' | {atom3, {atom4, non_neg_integer()}} | 'undefined',
   29:          b_field   :: boolean() | 'undefined',
   30:          c_field   :: list(term()) | 'undefined',
   31:          d_field   :: non_neg_integer() | 'undefined'}).
   32: -record('Quoted_record',
   33:         {'A_field'   :: atom1 | atom2 | btom | 'my atom' | {atom3, {atom4, non_neg_integer()}} | 'undefined',
   34:          b_field   :: boolean() | 'undefined',
   35:          c_field   :: list(term()) | 'undefined',
   36:          d_field   :: non_neg_integer() | 'undefined'}).
   37: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   38: 
   39: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   40:     cleanup(),
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   44:     ok.
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   48:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   49: 
   50: all() ->
   51:     [normal, filename_completion, binding_completion, get_coverage, type_completion, 
   52:      record_completion, fun_completion, map_completion, function_parameter_completion,
   53:      no_completion, quoted_fun, quoted_module, quoted_both, erl_1152, check_trailing,
   54:      unicode].
   55: 
   56: groups() ->
   57:     [].
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   63:     cleanup(),
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: 
   69: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   70:     Config.
   71: 
   72: cleanup() ->
   73:     [try
   74:          code:purge(M),
   75:          code:delete(M)
   76:      catch _:_ -> ok end || M <- [expand_test, expand_test1, expand_function_parameter,
   77:                                   'ExpandTestCaps', 'ExpandTestCaps1',
   78:                                 complete_function_parameter]].
   79: 
   80: normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   81:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
   82:     %% These tests might fail if another module with the prefix
   83:     %% "expand_" happens to also be loaded.
   84:     {yes,"test:",[]} = do_expand("expand_"),
   85:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
   86:     {no,[],[#{
   87:                title:="functions",
   88:                elems:=[{"a_fun_name",[{ending,"("}]},
   89:                         {"a_less_fun_name",_},
   90:                         {"b_comes_after_a",_},
   91:                         {"expand0arity_entirely",_},
   92:                         {"module_info",_}]
   93:               }]} = do_expand("expand_test:"),
   94:     {yes,[],[#{title:="functions",
   95:                       elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},{"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test:a_"),
   96:     {yes,"arity_entirely()",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:expand0"),
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: to_atom(Str) ->
  100:     case erl_scan:string(Str) of
  101:         {ok, [{atom,_,A}], _} ->
  102:             {ok, A};
  103:         _ ->
  104:             error
  105:     end.
  106: 
  107: type_completion(_Config) ->
  108:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 20}),
  109:     {Time,_} = timer:tc(fun() -> do_expand("erl_pp:expr(") end),
  110:     case Time of
  111:         Time when Time > 5000000 ->
  112:             {skip, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Expansion too slow (~p) on this machine",[Time]))};
  113:         _ ->
  114:             parallelforeach(
  115:             fun(Mod) ->
  116:                     Exports = edlin_expand:get_exports(Mod),
  117:                     [try
  118:                         Str = io_lib:write_atom(Mod) ++ ":" ++ io_lib:write_atom(Func) ++ "(",
  119:                         do_expand(Str)
  120:                     catch E:R:ST ->
  121:                             erlang:raise(E, {R, Mod, Func}, ST)
  122:                     end || {Func, _}<- Exports]
  123:             end, [list_to_atom(M) || {M,_,_} <- code:all_available()]),
  124:             ok
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: parallelforeach(Fun, List) ->
  128:     case parallelforeach(Fun, List, #{}, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)) of
  129:         [] -> ok;
  130:         Else -> ct:fail(Else)
  131:     end.
  132: parallelforeach(_Fun, [], Workers, _MaxWorkers) when map_size(Workers) =:= 0 ->
  133:     [];
  134: parallelforeach(Fun, List, Workers, MaxWorkers) when MaxWorkers =:= map_size(Workers);
  135:                                                      List =:= [] ->
  136:     receive
  137:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, normal} ->
  138:             parallelforeach(Fun, List, maps:remove(Ref, Workers), MaxWorkers);
  139: 
  140:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason} ->
  141:             {Arg, NewWorkers} = maps:take(Ref, Workers),
  142:             [{Arg, Reason} | parallelforeach(Fun, List, NewWorkers, MaxWorkers)]
  143:     end;
  144: parallelforeach(Fun, [H|T], Workers, MaxWorkers) ->
  145:     {_Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(H) end),
  146:     parallelforeach(Fun, T, Workers#{ Ref => H }, MaxWorkers).
  147: 
  148: filename_completion(Config) ->
  149:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  150:     {ok, CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  151:     file:set_cwd(DataDir),
  152:     {yes,"e\"",[]} = do_expand("\"visible\\ fil"),
  153:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\"visible fil"),
  154:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\" "),
  155:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\"\""),
  156:     {yes, "e\"", []} = do_expand("\".hidden\\ fil"),
  157:     {yes,"/", []} = do_expand("\".."),
  158:     {yes,"ta/", _} = do_expand("\"../edlin_expand_SUITE_da"),
  159:     {yes,"erl\"",[]} = do_expand("\"complete_function_parameter."),
  160:     R = case {os:type(), file:native_name_encoding()} of
  161:         {{win32,_}, _} -> {skip, "Unicode on filenames in windows are tricky"};
  162:         {_,latin1} -> {skip, "Cannot interpret unicode filenames when native_name_encoding is latin1"};
  163:         _ ->
  164:             {yes,"isible",
  165:             [{"visible file",_},{"visible_file",_},{"visibleüòÄ_file",_}]} = do_expand("\"v"),
  166:             {yes,"e\"",[]} = do_expand("\"visibleüòÄ_fil"),
  167:             {yes,[],
  168:             [{"../",[]},
  169:             {".hidden file",_},
  170:             {".hidden_file",_},
  171:             {".hiddenüòÄ_file",_}]} = do_expand("\"."),
  172:             ok
  173:     end,
  174:     file:set_cwd(CWD),
  175:     R.
  176: 
  177: no_completion(_Config) ->
  178:     %% No autocompletion, and no crashes
  179:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("[{"),
  180:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("a [{"),
  181:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("a [{{"),
  182:     ok.
  183: record_completion(_Config) ->
  184:     %% test record completion for loaded records
  185:     %% test record field name completion
  186:     %% test record field completion
  187:     {yes,"ord{", []} = do_expand("#a_rec"),
  188:     {yes,"uoted_record'{", []} = do_expand("#'Q"),
  189:     {no, [], [#{title:="fields", elems:=[{"a_field",_}, {"b_field",_}, {"c_field",_}, {"d_field",_}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{"),
  190:     {no, [], [#{title:="fields", elems:=[{"a_field",_}, {"b_field",_}, {"c_field",_}, {"d_field",_}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record."),
  191:     {yes,"eld=", []} = do_expand("#a_record{a_fi"),
  192:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=
  193:              [{"atom1",[]},
  194:               {"atom2",[]},
  195:               {"btom",[]},
  196:               {"'my atom'",[]},
  197:               {"{atom3, ...}",[]}],
  198:              options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field="),
  199:     %% test that an already specified field does not get suggested again
  200:     {no,[],
  201:     [#{title:="fields", elems:=
  202:               [{"a_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  203:                {"b_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  204:                {"c_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  205:                {"d_field",[{ending,"="}]}],
  206:               options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,b},"),
  207:     %% test match argument
  208:     {yes,_,[]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3"),
  209:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"{atom4, ...}",[]}],options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,"),
  210:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"integer() >= 0",[]}],options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, "),
  211:     {no,_,_} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, 1"),
  212:     {no,_,_} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, 1}"),
  213:     ok.
  214: 
  215: fun_completion(_Config) ->
  216:     {yes, "/1", []} = do_expand("fun lists:unzip3"),
  217:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("fun lists:unzip3/1,"),
  218:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("lists:unzip3/1"),
  219:     {no, [], [{"2",_},{"3",_}]} = do_expand("lists:seq/"),
  220:     %{yes, ", ", _} = do_expand("lists:all(fun erlang:is_atom/1"),
  221:     {no, [], [#{}]} = do_expand("lists:all(fun erlang:is_atom/1, "),
  222:     ok.
  223: 
  224: binding_completion(_Config) ->
  225:     %% test that bindings in the shell can be completed
  226:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("Bin"),
  227:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("file:open(Bin"),
  228:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("fun (X, Y) -> Bin"),
  229:     %% test unicode
  230:     {yes,"√∂ndag", []} = do_expand("S"),
  231:     {yes,"", []} = do_expand("√ñ"),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: map_completion(_Config) ->
  235:     %% test that key suggestion works for a known map in bindings
  236:     {no,[],[{"a_key",[{ending, "=>"}]},{"b_key",_},{"c_key",_}]} = do_expand("MapBinding#{"),
  237:     {yes, "_key=>", []} = do_expand("MapBinding#{b"),
  238:     {yes, "_key=>", []} = do_expand("MapBinding # { b"),
  239:     %% test that an already specified key does not get suggested again
  240:     {no, [], [{"a_key",_},{"c_key", _}]} = do_expand("MapBinding#{b_key=>1,"),
  241:     %% test that unicode works
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: function_parameter_completion(Config) ->
  245:     %% test first and second parameter
  246:     %% test multiple arities with same type on first parameter
  247:     %% test multiple arities with different type on first parameter
  248:     %% test that recursive types does not trigger endless loop
  249:     %% test that getting type of out of bound parameter does not trigger crash
  250:     compile_and_load2(Config,complete_function_parameter),
  251:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{title:="complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun/2", elems:=[]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  252:     {yes,":",[]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun(complete_function_parameter"),
  253:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name("),
  254:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,"),
  255:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]}  = do_expand("complete_function_parameter : a_fun_name ( 1 , "),
  256:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,2"),
  257:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,2,"),
  258:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"any()",[]},{"[any() | [Deeplist]]",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_deeplist_fun("),
  259:     {no,[],[#{title:="typespecs",
  260:                 elems:=[#{title:=
  261:                                "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(T1)",
  262:                           elems:=[#{title:="types",
  263:                                     elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  264:                                     options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  265:                           options:=[{highlight_param,1}]},
  266:                            #{title:=
  267:                                "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(T1, T2)",
  268:                             elems:=[#{title:="types",
  269:                                     elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  270:                                     options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  271:                             options:=[{highlight_param,1}]},
  272:                             #{title:=
  273:                                 "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun()",
  274:                             options:=[],
  275:                             elems:=[")"]}],
  276:                 options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun("),
  277:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"true",[]},{"false",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(1,"),
  278:     {no,[],
  279:         [#{elems :=
  280:             [#{elems :=
  281:                     [#{elems := [{"integer()",[]}],
  282:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  283:                         title := "types"}],
  284:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  285:                 title :=
  286:                     "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(T1)"},
  287:                 #{elems :=
  288:                     [#{elems := [{"true",[]},{"false",[]}],
  289:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  290:                         title := "types"}],
  291:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  292:                 title :=
  293:                     "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)"}],
  294:         options := [highlight_all],
  295:         title := "typespecs"}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun("),
  296:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(false,"),
  297:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"{atom1, ...}",[]},
  298:                                               {"atom1",[]},
  299:                                               {"atom2",[]},
  300:                                               {"[atom4 | atom5]",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter("),
  301:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom1",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter({"),
  302:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"{integer() >= 0, ...}",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter({atom1,"),
  303:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom4",[]},{"atom5",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter(["),
  304:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom4",[]},{"atom5",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter : advanced_nested_parameter ( [ , "),
  305:     {no,[],
  306:     [#{elems :=
  307:            [#{elems :=
  308:                   [#{elems := [{"integer()",[]}],
  309:                      options := [{hide,title}],
  310:                      title := "types"}],
  311:               options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  312:               title :=
  313:                   "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(T1)"},
  314:             #{elems :=
  315:                   [#{elems := [{"true",[]},{"false",[]}],
  316:                      options := [{hide,title}],
  317:                      title := "types"}],
  318:               options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  319:               title :=
  320:                   "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)"}],
  321:        options := [highlight_all],
  322:        title := "typespecs"}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun("),
  323:     %% Hide results where the type of the first parameters does not match the prototype header
  324:     {no,[],
  325:     [#{title:="typespecs",
  326:         elems:=[#{title:="complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)",
  327:             elems:=[#{title:="types",
  328:                  elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  329:                  options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  330:             options:=[{highlight_param,2}]}],
  331:         options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(false,"),
  332:     {no, _, []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(atom,"),
  333:     {yes, _, _} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:'emoji"),
  334: 
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: get_coverage(Config) ->
  338:     compile_and_load2(Config,complete_function_parameter),
  339:     do_expand("\""),
  340:     do_expand("\"."),
  341:     do_expand("\"../"),
  342:     do_expand("\"/"),
  343:     do_expand("fun m:f"),
  344:     do_expand("fun m:f/"),
  345:     do_expand("#"),
  346:     do_expand("MapBinding#{"),
  347:     do_expand("B"),
  348:     do_expand("#a_record{"),
  349:     do_expand("#a_record{a_field=>"),
  350: 
  351:     %% match_arguments and is_type tests
  352:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{"),
  353:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a"),
  354:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>"),
  355:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1"),
  356:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,"),
  357:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>err"),
  358:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>error"),
  359:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>error}"),
  360:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,b=>2,c=>3,d=>error"),
  361:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{}, "),
  362:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{V=>1}, "),
  363:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>V}, "),
  364:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:tuple_parameter_function({a,b}, "),
  365:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:tuple_parameter_function({a,V}, "),
  366:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([], "),
  367:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([atom], "),
  368:     true = {no, [], []} =/= do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([V], "),
  369:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_empty_list_parameter_function([atom], "),
  370:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_empty_list_parameter_function([], "),
  371:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:binary_parameter_function(<<0>>, "),
  372:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:binary_parameter_function(<<V>>, "),
  373:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:integer_parameter_function(0, "),
  374:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_neg_integer_parameter_function(1, "),
  375:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:neg_integer_parameter_function(-1, "),
  376:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:float_parameter_function(0.1, "),
  377:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:pid_parameter_function(<0.1.0>, "),
  378:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:port_parameter_function(#Port<0.1>, "),
  379:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:record_parameter_function(#a_record{a = 1}, "),
  380:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(#Fun<erl_eval.1.0>, "),
  381:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(fun(X) -> X end, "), %% Todo verify fun arity
  382:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(receive X -> X end, "),
  383:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(V, "),
  384:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function((1+2), "),
  385:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(some_call(), "),
  386:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(#Nope<1.0>, "),
  387:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:reference_parameter_function(#Ref<1.0.1.0>, "),
  388:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:any_parameter_function(#Ref<1.0.1.0>, "),
  389:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function(atom, "),
  390:     true = {no, [], []} =/= do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function2(1, "),
  391:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:atom_parameter_function(atom, "),
  392:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function(atom"),
  393:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:atom_parameter_function(atom"),
  394:     %% user_defined function
  395:     {yes, "func(", _} =
  396:         do_expand("my_"),
  397:     {no,[],[#{elems :=
  398:             [#{elems :=
  399:                     [#{elems := [{"#my_record",[]}],
  400:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  401:                         title := "types"}],
  402:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  403:                 title := "shell_default:my_func(A)"}],
  404:         options := [highlight_all],
  405:         title := "typespecs"}]} =
  406:         do_expand("my_func("),
  407:     {yes,"=",[]} =
  408:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{ field"),
  409:     {no,[],
  410:         [#{elems :=
  411:                 [#{elems := [{"a_value",[]},{"b_value",[]}],
  412:                     options := [{separator," :: "},{highlight_all}],
  413:                     title := "erlang:my_type()"}],
  414:             options := [{hide,title}],
  415:             title := "types"}]} =
  416:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{ field=>"),
  417:     {yes,"ue, ",[]} =
  418:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{field=>a_val"),
  419:     %% bifs()
  420:     {yes, "st(", _} =
  421:         do_expand("integer_to_li"),
  422:     %% commands()
  423:     {yes, "(", _} =
  424:         do_expand("bt"),
  425:     {yes, ":", _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("complete_function_parameter")),
  426:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("#")),
  427:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("UnbindedMap#")),
  428:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("UnbindedMap#{")),
  429:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("#{")),
  430:     {yes, "(", _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name")),
  431: 
  432:     do_expand("fun l"),
  433:     %{yes, ">", _} = 
  434:     do_expand("fun () -"),
  435:     %{yes, "n ", _} =
  436:     do_expand("fun () whe "),
  437:     %{no, [], []} =
  438:     do_expand("fun () when "),
  439:     %{no, [], []} = 
  440:     do_expand("fun () -> "),
  441:     %% {keyword, ...}
  442:     do_expand("M#"),
  443:     do_expand("#non_existant_record"),
  444:     do_expand("#a_record{ non_existand_field"),
  445:     
  446:     
  447:     %% match_arguments coverage
  448:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:integer_parameter_function(atom,"), %% match_argument -> false
  449:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_zero_arity_fun()"), %% match_argument, parameters empty
  450:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(thread"),
  451:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(thread_nope"),
  452:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(threads"),
  453:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priori"),
  454:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority_nope"),
  455:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, "),
  456:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, atom"),
  457:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, 1"),
  458:     do_expand("erlang:system_info({allocator,"),
  459:     do_expand("lists:seq(1"),
  460:     do_expand("lists:seq(1, 10"),
  461:     do_expand("ssh:connect({"),
  462:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,"),
  463:     do_expand("ssh:connect({'$i"),
  464:     do_expand("ssh:connect({'$x"),
  465:     do_expand("ssh:connect({1000,"),
  466:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,255,255,255,255,255,255,255"),
  467:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,255,255,255}, ["),
  468:     do_expand("ssh:connect(receive V -> V end, "),
  469:     do_expand("ssh:connect((1+2), "),
  470:     do_expand("ssh:connect(hej(), "),
  471:     do_expand("ssh:connect(fun() -> ok end, "),
  472:     do_expand("ssh:connect(fun a:b/1, "),
  473:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [in"),
  474:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [inet"),
  475:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [inet, "),
  476:     do_expand("atom_to_list("),
  477:     do_expand("help("),
  478:     do_expand("h(lists"),
  479:     do_expand("ht(lists"),
  480:     do_expand("h(file,"),
  481:     do_expand("ht(file,"),
  482:     do_expand("ht(file,mode"),
  483:     do_expand("file:get_cwd()"),
  484:     do_expand("fl"),
  485:     do_expand("fl("),
  486:     do_expand("fl()"),
  487:     do_expand("MapBinding#"),
  488:     do_expand("RecordBinding#"),
  489:     do_expand("TupleBinding#"),
  490:     do_expand("Binding#"),
  491:     do_expand("MyVar"),
  492:     {_, _, M0} = do_expand("ssh:connect("),
  493:     do_format(M0),
  494:     {_, _, M1} = do_expand("ssh:connect({"),
  495:     do_format(M1),
  496:     {_, _, M6} = do_expand("ssh:connect({},["),
  497:     do_format(M6),
  498:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M6, 20)),
  499:     {_, _, M2} = do_expand("e"),
  500:     do_format(M2),
  501:     {_, _, M3} = do_expand("erlang:i"),
  502:     do_format(M3),
  503:     {_, _, M4} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  504:     do_format(M4),
  505:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M4, 20)),
  506:     {_,_,M5}=edlin_expand:expand("e"),
  507:     do_format(M5),
  508:     {_,_,M7}=edlin_expand:expand("erlang:"),
  509:     do_format(M7),
  510:     {_,_,M8}=edlin_expand:expand("e"),
  511:     do_format(M8),
  512:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M8, 20)),
  513:     {_,_,M9}=edlin_expand:expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  514:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M9, 20)),
  515:     do_format(M5),
  516:     {_, _, M10} = edlin_expand:expand("ssh:connect({},["),
  517:     do_format(M10),
  518:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M10, 20)),
  519:     %% Test that we are not filtering duplicates bit with different case or different string lengths
  520:     {yes,"e", M11} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:cas"),
  521:     "\e[;1;4mfunctions\e[0m\ncaseSensitiveFunction(        casesensitivefunction(        \ncaseSensitiveFunctionName(\n" = do_format(M11),
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: %% Normal module name, some function names using quoted atoms.
  525: quoted_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  526:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
  527:     {module,expand_test1} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test1),
  528:     %% should be no colon after test this time
  529:     {yes, "test", [#{title:="modules", elems:=[{"expand_test",[{ending, ":"}]},{"expand_test1",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_"),
  530:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
  531:     {no,[],[#{title:="functions",
  532:                      elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  533:                             {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  534:                             {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_},
  535:                             {"a_fun_name",_},
  536:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  537:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  538:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:"),
  539:     {yes,"_",[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  540:                               {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a"),
  541:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  542:                              {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a_"),
  543:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  544:                              {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  545:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'"),
  546:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  547:                                        {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Q"),
  548:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  549:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Quoted_fun_"),
  550:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'#"),
  551: 
  552:     %% Since there is a module_info/1 as well as a module_info/0
  553:     %% there should not be a closing parenthesis added.
  554:     {yes,"(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:module_info"),
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: quoted_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  558:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  559:     {yes, "Caps':",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  560:     {no,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  561:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  562:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  563:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':"),
  564:     {yes,[],[#{title:="functions", elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  565:                                                 {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':a_"),
  566:     ok.
  567: 
  568: quoted_both(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  569:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  570:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps1'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps1'),
  571:     %% should be no colon (or quote) after test this time
  572:     {yes, "Caps", [#{elems:=[{"'ExpandTestCaps'",[{ending, ":"}]},{"'ExpandTestCaps1'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  573:     {no,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  574:                             {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  575:                             {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_},
  576:                             {"a_fun_name",_},
  577:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  578:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  579:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':"),
  580:     {yes,"_",[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},{"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a"),
  581:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  582:                              {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a_"),
  583:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  584:                              {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  585:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'"),
  586:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},{"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Q"),
  587:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  588:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Quoted_fun_"),
  589:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'()",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'#"),
  590:     ok.
  591: 
  592: %% Note: pull request #1152.
  593: erl_1152(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  594:     "foo"++"    "++[1089]++_ = do_format(["foo",[1089]]),
  595:     ok.
  596: 
  597: check_trailing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  598:     Str = lists:duplicate(80, $1),
  599:     StrF = do_format([Str]),
  600:     {_, "...\n"} = lists:split(76, StrF),
  601:     ok.
  602: 
  603: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  604:     {module,unicode_expand} = compile_and_load(Config,'unicode_expand'),
  605:     {no,[], [#{elems:=[{"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º'",_},
  606:                              {"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'",_},
  607:                              {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:"),
  608:     {yes,"—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º", [#{elems:=[{"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º'",_},
  609:                                               {"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'–∫l–∏"),
  610:     {yes,"–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º", [#{elems:=[{"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º'",_},
  611:                                         {"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á"),
  612:     {yes,"(", []} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'"),
  613:     "'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º'     '–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'    module_info\n" =
  614:         do_format([{"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–º'",[]},
  615:                    {"'–∫l–∏—Ä–∏–ª–ª–∏ÃÅ—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ç–æ–ºB'",[]},
  616:                    {"module_info",[]}]),
  617:     ok.
  618: 
  619: do_expand(String) ->
  620:     io:format(String),
  621:     Bs = [
  622:           {'Binding', 0},
  623:           {'MapBinding', #{a_key=>0, b_key=>1, c_key=>2}},
  624:           {'RecordBinding', {some_record, 1, 2}},
  625:           {'TupleBinding', {0, 1, 2}},
  626:           {'S√∂ndag', 0},
  627:           {'√ñ', 0}],
  628:     Rt = ets:new(records, []),
  629: 
  630:     Rt2 = [{my_record, {attribute,[{text,"record"},
  631:                         {location,{1,2}}],
  632:                     record,
  633:                     {my_record, [{typed_record_field,{record_field,[{text,"field"},
  634:                                                                             {location,{1,20}}],
  635:                                                                             {atom,[{text,"field"},{location,{1,20}}],field},
  636:                                                                             {atom,[{text,"a_value"},{location,{1,28}}],a_value}},
  637:                                                             {user_type,[{text,"my_type"},{location,{1,33}}],
  638:                                                                         my_type,[]}}]}}}],
  639:     Ft = [{{function,{shell_default,my_func,1}},fun(_A)->0 end},
  640:           {{function_type,{shell_default,my_func,1}},
  641:                 {attribute,[{text,"spec"},{location,{1,2}}],
  642:                 spec,
  643:                 {{my_func,1},
  644:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  645:                 bounded_fun,
  646:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  647:                 'fun',
  648:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  649:                         product,
  650:                         [{var,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,15}}],'A'}]},
  651:                 {type,[{text,"integer"},{location,{1,21}}],integer,[]}]},
  652:                 [{type,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],
  653:                 constraint,
  654:                 [{atom,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],is_subtype},
  655:                 [{var,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],'A'},
  656:            {type,[{text,"#"},{location,{1,41}}],
  657:                 record,
  658:                 [{atom,[{text,"my_record"},{location,{1,42}}],
  659:                         my_record}]}]]}]]}]}}},
  660:         {{type,my_type},
  661:             {attribute,[{text,"type"},{location,{1,2}}],
  662:             type,
  663:             {my_type,{type,[{text,"a"},{location,{1,20}}],
  664:             union,
  665:             [{atom,[{text,"a_value"},{location,{1,20}}],a_value},
  666:             {atom,[{text,"b_value"},{location,{1,24}}],b_value}]},
  667:             []}}}],
  668:     shell:read_and_add_records(edlin_expand_SUITE, '_', [], Bs, Rt),
  669:     edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse(String), [], {shell_state, Bs, ets:tab2list(Rt)++Rt2, Ft}).
  670: 
  671: do_format(StringList) ->
  672:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(StringList, 79)).
  673: 
  674: compile_and_load2(Config, Module) ->
  675:     Filename = filename:join(
  676:                  proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  677:                  atom_to_list(Module)),
  678:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  679:     c:c(Filename, [debug_info, {outdir, PrivDir}]).
  680: 
  681: compile_and_load(Config,Module) ->
  682:     Filename = filename:join(
  683:                  proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  684:                  atom_to_list(Module)),
  685:     {ok,Module,Bin} = compile:file(Filename, [binary]),
  686:     code:load_binary(Module, Filename, Bin).
